      Specifies the context for key derivation.

      This parameter will only be used when a key is expected to be created.

      The data to encrypt.
      Encrypt.Request Encrypt.Request.encryptionKeyName​(String encryptionKeyName)
      Specifies the name of the encryption key to encrypt against.
      Encrypt.Request Encrypt.Request.encryptionKeyType​(String type)
      This parameter is required when encryption key is expected to be created.
      Encrypt.Request Encrypt.Request.encryptionKeyVersion​(int version)
      Specifies the version of the key to use for encryption.
      Encrypt.Request Encrypt.Request.nonce​(Base64Value value)
      Specifies the nonce value.
